reverse_mapping.description: Stores a reverse mapping of IP addresses after responding to a DNS query in order to provide domain names when routing.

strategy.description: Default domain strategy for resolving the domain names.

independent_cache.description: Make each DNS server's cache independent for special purposes. If enabled, will slightly degrade performance.

client_subnet.description: Append a `edns0-subnet` OPT extra record with the specified IP prefix to every query by default.

__schema0.description: The tag of the upstream outbound.

__schema1.description: The network interface to bind to.

__schema2.description: The IPv4 address to bind to.

__schema3.description: The IPv6 address to bind to.

__schema6.description: Set network namespace, name or path.

__schema7.description: Connect timeout, in golang's Duration format.

__schema11.description: Set domain resolver to use for resolving domain names.

server.description: Tag of a another server to resolve the domain name in the address.

strategy.description: The domain strategy for resolving the domain name in the address.

disable_cache.description: Disable cache and save cache in this query.

client_subnet.description: Append a `edns0-subnet` OPT extra record with the specified IP prefix to every query by default.

__schema12.description: Default domain strategy for resolving the domain names.

fallback_delay.description: The length of time to wait before spawning a RFC 6555 Fast Fallback connection.

__schema17.description: The length of time to wait before spawning a RFC 6555 Fast Fallback connection.

__schema18.description: Default domain strategy for resolving the domain names.

path.description: List of paths to hosts files.

server.description: The address of the TCP DNS server.

server_port.description: The port of the TCP DNS server.

server.description: The address of the UDP DNS server.

server_port.description: The port of the UDP DNS server.

server.description: The address of the TLS DNS server.

server_port.description: The port of the TLS DNS server.

disable_sni.description: Do not send server name in ClientHello.

server_name.description: Used to verify the hostname on the returned certificates unless insecure is given.

alpn.description: List of supported application level protocols, in order of preference.

min_version.description: The minimum TLS version that is acceptable.

max_version.description: The maximum TLS version that is acceptable.

cipher_suites.description: A list of enabled TLS 1.0–1.2 cipher suites.

certificate.description: The server certificate line array, in PEM format.

certificate_path.description: The path to the server certificate, in PEM format.

fragment.description: Fragment TLS handshakes to bypass firewalls.

fragment_fallback_delay.description: The fallback value used when TLS segmentation cannot automatically determine the wait time.

record_fragment.description: Fragment TLS handshake into multiple TLS records to bypass firewalls.

config.description: ECH configuration line array, in PEM format.

config_path.description: The path to ECH configuration, in PEM format.

public_key.description: Public key, generated by `sing-box generate reality-keypair`.

short_id.description: A hexadecimal string with zero to eight digits.

server.description: The address of the QUIC DNS server.

server_port.description: The port of the QUIC DNS server.

server.description: The address of the HTTPS DNS server.

server_port.description: The port of the HTTPS DNS server.

path.description: The path of the HTTPS DNS server. `/dns-query` will be used by default.

headers.description: Additional headers to be sent to the DNS server.

server.description: The address of the HTTP3 DNS server.

server_port.description: The port of the HTTP3 DNS server.

path.description: The path of the HTTP3 DNS server. `/dns-query` will be used by default.

headers.description: Additional headers to be sent to the DNS server.

endpoint.description: The tag of the Tailscale Endpoint.

accept_default_resolvers.description: Indicates whether default DNS resolvers should be accepted for fallback queries in addition to MagicDNS，

service.description: The tag of the Resolved Service.

accept_default_resolvers.description: Indicates whether the default DNS resolvers should be accepted for fallback queries in addition to matching domains.

LegacyDNSServer.description: Legacy DNS servers is deprecated and will be removed in sing-box 1.14.0, check Migration.

tag.description: The tag of the dns server.

address.description: The address of the dns server.

address_resolver.description: Tag of a another server to resolve the domain name in the address.

address_strategy.description: The domain strategy for resolving the domain name in the address.

strategy.description: Default domain strategy for resolving the domain names.

detour.description: Tag of an outbound for connecting to the dns server.

client_subnet.description: Append a `edns0-subnet` OPT extra record with the specified IP prefix to every query by default.

strategy.description: Set domain strategy for this query.

disable_cache.description: Disable cache and save cache in this query.
Disable cache and save cache in this query.

method.description: Reply with REFUSED or drop the request.

no_drop.description: If not enabled, `method` will be temporarily overwritten to `drop` after 50 triggers in 30s.

answer.description: List of text DNS record to respond as answers.

ns.description: List of text DNS record to respond as name servers.

extra.description: List of text DNS record to respond as extra records.

__schema27.description: DNS query type. Values can be integers or type name strings.

__schema38.description: Match IP CIDR with query response.

__schema39.description: Match private IP with query response.

__schema40.description: Match any IP with query response.

__schema49.description: Match process path using regular expression.

__schema55.description: Match if network is considered Metered.

__schema56.description: Match if network is in Low Data Mode.

__schema60.description: Make `ip_cidr` rule items in rule-sets match the source IP.

__schema61.description: Make `ip_cidr` rules in rule-sets accept empty query response.
